name: forta-agent-makerdao-bridge-invariant
displayName: Forta Agent - MakerDAO Bridge Invariant Checks
description: A Forta Agent for monitoring discrepancies between Layer 1 escrow DAI balances and Layer 2 DAI supplies on Optimism.
longDescription: This Forta Agent monitors the MakerDAO bridge invariants by checking discrepancies between the Layer 1 escrow DAI balances and the Layer 2 DAI supplies on the Optimism network. It generates alerts if there are significant discrepancies, helping to ensure the integrity of cross-layer DAI transfers.

scripts.start:dev: nodemon --watch src --watch forta.config.json -e js,ts,json  --exec "npm run build && forta-agent run"
